CUSTOM_SPELLS_5E.Title: Custom Spells 5e
CUSTOM_SPELLS_5E.Notifications.Submitted: Your custom spell '{spellName}' has been submitted for GM review.
CUSTOM_SPELLS_5E.Notifications.Approved: Your custom spell '{spellName}' has been approved by the GM and added to your spell list.
CUSTOM_SPELLS_5E.Notifications.Denied: Your custom spell '{spellName}' has been denied by the GM. Reason: {reason}
CUSTOM_SPELLS_5E.Notifications.ChangesSu: The GM has suggested changes for your custom spell '{spellName}'. Notes: {notes}
